page.title: 11HOME LIFE IN EAST SHROPSHIRE
page.content: I live in a{semi detached house}with three bedrooms.I sleep with my brother in bunk beds they are two beds on top of one another. My dad goes bowling he plays with two wooden balls a mat and a little wooden ball called a jack. we like animals we've got two goldfish which live in a fish tank and a budgerigar who lives in a cage. I like to go swimming with my brother and dad on sunday between 11-12p.m. Then we have our dinner we have chicken,peas,carrots and gravy.We go for a ride in the country in our Vauxhall Chevette car it was made in 1981.I have cereals for breakfast. At night time we watch television.My dad is an ambulanceman and my mom works in a wine shop.Every Saturday we go to {Wellington}and have fish and chips.
